azurerm_api_management_identity_provider.description: Manages an API Management Twitter Identity Provider.

api_management_name.description: The Name of the API Management Service where this Twitter Identity Provider should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The Name of the Resource Group where the API Management Service exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

api_key.description: App Consumer API key for Twitter.

api_secret_key.description: App Consumer API secret key for Twitter.

id.description: The ID of the API Management Twitter Identity Provider.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management Twitter Identity Provider.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management Twitter Identity Provider.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management Twitter Identity Provider.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management Twitter Identity Provider.
